biotools.summary: Extensive server possessing a wide range of tools for pattern discovery in DNA and protein sequences as well as in text. Tools for multiple sequence alignment, gene discovery, protein annotation, and other applications also exist on this server. A detailed help page is provided for all tools.

bioschemas.name: IBM Bioinformatics and Pattern Discovery Group
